languages.text: На ее теле была найдена предсмертная записка. Это была исповедь девочки из подулья, чудесным образом вырвавшейся из границ уготованной ей судьбы, обретшей славу, богатства и даже человека, которого она осмелилась полюбить. К несчастью, и слава, и троны, и любовь оказались ложью, как и глупая надежда избежать написанной на роду смерти в одиночестве и мраке, без крупицы еды и воды.

A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.
languages.original_text: На ее теле была найдена предсмертная записка. Это была исповедь девочки из подулья, чудесным образом вырвавшейся из границ уготованной ей судьбы, обретшей славу, богатства и даже человека, которого она осмелилась полюбить. К несчастью, и слава, и троны, и любовь оказались ложью, как и глупая надежда избежать написанной на роду смерти в одиночестве и мраке, без крупицы еды и воды.

traits.locale_text: A note was found on her body — a confession of a girl from the underhive, who by a miracle was able to break free from her allotted fate, who found fate, riches and even a {mf|man|woman} who she gathered the courage to love. But as fate would have it, fame and thrones, and love turned out to be a lie, just like her foolish hope to escape the destiny to die alone in the dark without a grain of food or a drop of water.

But as fate would have it, fame and thrones, and love turned out to be a lie, just like her foolish hope to escape the destiny to die alone in the dark without a grain of food or a drop of water.

Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny to die alone in the dark without a grain of food or a drop of water.

Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny to die alone in the dark without a grain of food or a drop of water.

Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

languages.text: 她的尸体上放着一张纸条，上面写着一位来自巢都底层女孩的忏悔。她曾奇迹般地摆脱了自己的命运，收获了名声与财富，甚至还遇到了能让她鼓起勇气去爱的人。然而，仿若冥冥注定一般，她的名声、财富和爱情统统化作了乌有，而逃离命运的尝试也不过只是愚蠢的妄想。最终，她在黑暗中孤独地死去，身边没有一点食物，也没有一滴水。
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: 她的尸体上放着一张纸条，上面写着一位来自巢都底层女孩的忏悔。她曾奇迹般地摆脱了自己的命运，收获了名声与财富，甚至还遇到了一位她鼓起勇气去爱的人。然而，仿若冥冥注定一般，她的名声、财富和爱情统统化作了乌有，而逃离命运的尝试也不过只是愚蠢的妄想。最终，她在黑暗中孤独地死去，身边没有一粒食物，也没有一滴水。

languages.text: Bei ihrer Leiche wurde eine Nachricht gefunden — das Geständnis eines Mädchens aus dem Underhive, das wie durch ein Wunder aus ihrem Schicksal ausbrechen konnte, das reich und berühmt wurde und sogar jemanden fand, den sie sich zu lieben traute. Doch wie das Schicksal es so wollte, entpuppten sich ihr Ruhm, ihre Thronmünzen und ihre Liebe allesamt als Lügen, genau wie ihre törichte Hoffnung, ihrem Schicksal entkommen zu können. Sie starb allein in der Dunkelheit, ohne ein Körnchen Nahrung oder einen Tropfen Wasser.
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: Bei ihrer Leiche wurde eine Nachricht gefunden — das Geständnis eines Mädchens aus dem Underhive, das wie durch ein Wunder aus ihrem Schicksal ausbrechen konnte, das reich und berühmt wurde und sogar jemanden fand, den sie sich zu lieben traute. Doch wie das Schicksal es so wollte, entpuppten sich ihr Ruhm, ihre Thronmünzen und ihre Liebe allesamt als Lügen, genau wie ihre törichte Hoffnung, ihrem Schicksal entkommen zu können. Sie starb allein in der Dunkelheit, ohne ein Körnchen Nahrung oder einen Tropfen Wasser.

languages.text: On trouva sur son corps la confession manuscrite d'une femme originaire d'une sous-ruche qui avait réussi par miracle à s'affranchir de sa destinée pour trouver la célébrité, la fortune et même quelqu'un qu'elle eut l'audace d'aimer. Hélas, le sort se montra cruel à son égard. Sa gloire, ses trônes et même son amour n'étaient que mensonges, tout comme son espoir insensé d'échapper au destin qui l'attendait : celui de mourir seule dans le noir, sans une miette de nourriture ou la moindre goutte d'eau.
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: On trouva sur son corps la confession manuscrite d'une femme originaire d’une sous-ruche qui avait réussi par miracle à s'affranchir de sa destinée pour trouver la célébrité, la fortune et même quelqu'un qu'elle eut le courage d'aimer. Hélas, le sort se montra cruel à son égard. Sa gloire, ses conquêtes et même son amour n’étaient que mensonges, tout comme son espoir insensé d'échapper au destin qui l'attendait : celui de mourir seule dans le noir, sans une miette de nourriture ou la moindre goutte d'eau.

languages.text: Se encontró una nota en su cuerpo: la confesión de una muchacha de la colmena inferior que logró escapar de esa vida de forma milagrosa y encontrar la fama, la riqueza e incluso a alguien a quien se atrevió a amar. Sin embargo, en un capricho del destino, su fama, sus tronos y su amor resultaron ser falsos, al igual que su ingenua esperanza de evitar el futuro de morir sola en las tinieblas, sin un trozo de pan ni una gota de agua.
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: Se encontró una nota en su cuerpo: la confesión de una muchacha de la colmena inferior que logró escapar de esa vida de forma milagrosa y encontrar la fama, la riqueza e incluso a alguien a quien se atrevió a amar. Sin embargo, en un capricho del destino, su fama, sus tronos y su amor resultaron ser falsos, al igual que su ingenua esperanza de evitar el futuro de morir sola en las tinieblas, sin un trozo de pan ni una gota de agua.

languages.text: 女の屍にはメモが残されていた…アンダーハイヴで育った娘の告白が。奇跡的に運命を逃れることができた少女は、富と名声、さらに大胆にも愛する男をまでも手にした。ただ運命のいたずらか、彼女の名声と王座、そして愛は偽りだったと判明する。あたかも、運命を逃れていくばくの食料も水も持たず、暗闇のなかで孤独に死ぬ運命から逃れたいという、彼女の愚かな願いと軌を重ねるようにして。
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: 女の屍にはメモが残されていた…アンダーハイヴで育った娘の告白が。奇跡的に運命を逃れることができた少女は、富と名声、さらに愛すべき男をまでも手にすることになる。ただ運命のいたずらか、彼女の名声と王座、そして愛は偽りだったと判明する。あたかも、運命を逃れていくばくの食料も水も持たず、暗闇のなかでひとり死ぬ運命から逃れたいという、彼女の愚かな願いと軌を重ねるようにして。

languages.text: Cesedinde bir not bulundu: Kovanaltında doğan; mucize eseri kaderinin zincirlerini kırıp özgür kalan; şan, zenginlik ve hatta sevme cüreti gösterebileceği birini bulan bir kızın itirafları. Kaderinde şanının, geltlerinin ve aşkının yalan olduğunu öğrenmek varmış. Tıpkı kaderinden kaçma umudunun da aptalca bir yalan olduğu gibi. Onu karanlıkta bir başına, bir lokma yiyeceği veya bir damla suyu olmadan bırakan kaderinden.
languages.original_text: A note was found on her body — the confession of a girl from the underhive, who by some miracle had managed to break free from her destiny, who had found fame, riches, and even a person she was bold enough to love. Yet, as fate would have it, her fame, thrones, and love turned out to be lies, just like her foolish hope of escaping her destiny, which doomed her to die alone in the dark without a crumb of food or a drop of water.

traits.locale_text: Cesedinde bir not bulundu: Kovanaltında doğan; mucize eseri kaderinin zincirlerini kırıp özgür kalan; şan, zenginlik ve hatta sevme cüreti gösterebileceği birini bulan bir kızın itirafları. Kaderinde şanının, geltlerinin ve aşkının yalan olduğunu öğrenmek varmış. Tıpkı kaderinden kaçma umudunun da aptalca bir yalan olduğu gibi. Onu karanlıkta bir başına, bir lokma yiyeceği veya bir damla suyu olmadan bırakan kaderinden.
